dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.soft.LogicalDeviceOSInteractionDetails
dataStructure.description:
This is an association class, and defines the semantics of the LogicalDeviceUsesOS association. This is a complex class, and consequently only a few simple attributes are shown in this viewpoint in order for the reader to get a flavor of the types of parameters defined in this class.This association defines the semantics of how a particular LogicalDevice entity interacts with its OperatingSystem. The semantics of this association are defined in the LogicalDeviceOSInteractionDetails association class.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: LogicalDeviceOSInteractionDetails

child.name: logDeviceOSVersionMinReq
child.description:
This attribute defines the minimum version of the OperatingSystem that is required for this LogicalDevice to act properly.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: logDeviceOSVersionMinReq

child.name: numberInstalledOSs
child.description:
This attribute defines the number of currently installed OSs on this particular LogicalDevice.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: numberInstalledOSs

child.name: currentlyUsedOS
child.description:
This attribute contains the name of the OS that is currently being used by this LogicalDevice.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: currentlyUsedOS
